      • displayOptions

        private static boolean[] displayOptions​(java.lang.String title,
                                        java.lang.String[] options)
        Allow the user to choose what data they want to see
        Parameters:
        title - The title displayed at the top of the option pane
        options - The array of choices to be displayed to the user
        Returns:
        A boolean array of user selections

        Convert the given RGB values into HSV values

        Returns:

      • format

        Format pixel data to be displayed
        Parameters:
        format - The format string to be applied to the data
        data - The int array to be formatted

        The formatted string
